title: Samoa Joe Hosts Kinda Funny Games Daily! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.10.22
description:
Samoa Joe joins Greg to talk about PlayStation and Nintendo suspending sales in Russia, abuse allegations at PlayStation, and WWE 2K22 DLC.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:30 - Housekeeping
BIG OL DAY OF WRESTLING!
Joe now & WWE 2K22 after this
AEW’s Fuego Del Sol on the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon - live on patreon, tomorrow on youtube
CEO JR. Barrett Courtney has an Persona 4 Arena Ultimate unboxing up on youtube and our socials.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:07:40 - PlayStation, Nintendo Stop Business in Russia, Ryan Browne @ CNBC
00:11:51 - More Women Allege Sexism at PS, Stephen Totilo @ Axios
00:19:05 - PlayStation State of Play Recap
00:23:50 - Yesterday's presentation solidified that there is a stark difference between a State of Play and a PlayStation Showcase. - Best Friends Q:Luciddre4m
00:26:47 - Dream collection of older games - Best Friends Q:The 5 Star Man
00:30:50 - Ad
00:34:30 - BREAKING NEWS: Super Nintendo World is officially set to open at Universal Studios Hollywood in 2023
https://twitter.com/PopCrave/status/1501983078431924224
00:37:03 - Overwatch 2 Beta Coming Soon As Blizzard "Decouples" PvP And PvE To Release Content Faster, Chris Pereira @ GameSpot
00:45:17 - Dead Space Remake Delayed, Jeff Grubb @ GIB
00:47:25 - WWE 2K22 DLC Reveal, Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:54:20 - Diablo 2 Creators opening new studio, Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:56:10 - Out today
00:59:01 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless and Zack Zweizen
